Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.output

Interface FileOutput

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Flushable, LogLifecycle, LogOutput
public interface FileOutput extends LogOutput
An output that is designed for writing to a file.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE

      static final int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE
      Default file buffer size. This size was chosen based on Logbacks default.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • of

      @LogConfigurable(prefix="logging.output.{name}.") static FileOutput of(@KeyParameter String name, @Nullable URI uri, @Nullable String fileName, @Nullable Boolean append, @Nullable Boolean prudent, @DefaultParameter("DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE") Integer bufferSize) throws UncheckedIOException
      Creates file output.
      Parameters:
      name - name of output not file name.
      uri - file uri.
      fileName - file name.
      append - whether or not to append to existing file.
      prudent - logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
      bufferSize - buffer size in bytes.
      Returns:
      file output.
      Throws:
      UncheckedIOException - if file not found.
